children.label: Technical lead of two (2) teams, backend and frontend teams, that handles multiple domains or projects each
Technical consultant or SME to the handled projects, and a part of planning and architecture of new projects/features to be implemented

Provides regular brown bags or knowledge transfers about technical and soft skills to the department-level audience
Creates detailed and well-organized technical documentation; Also introduced templates on how to do proper technical documents
Regularly conducts checkpoints to each team member and as a team for a thorough performance evaluation to align expectations and improve skills and experienced pain points
Interviews potential candidates for software engineering roles (Responsible for the technical assessments of the applicants)
